website_summaries.verdict: Featuring fan-favorites like Poison, Ninja, and Floatie Kirby, these inexpensive backpack hangers are a great way to share your appreciation for the little pink hero.
pros: 8 Kirby variants, Waddle Dee, and Meta Knight backpack hangers to find
Each includes large yellow plastic clip
cons: 1 in 8 chance of getting the toy you want

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE BLIND BAG
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading, we thought we were buying a ten pack of Kirby toys and when it arrived there was only ONE blind bag with toy inside! This is a forgivable flaw in the posting as it was simply displaying the first uploaded picture, however this was WAY overpriced for just one little toy and caused my family a lot of heartache at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: kathy freeman

customer_reviews.title: Super cute squad
customer_reviews.text: Painted and sculpted very nicely, it's a very cute addition to my Kirby collection! The keyring itself is made of garbage plastic, but it's cute for displaying. Replace with a sturdy metal keyring if you want to put it on a bag of some sort or it'll break off.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading. We thought we were buying a pack since that’s what is shown and the description said “pack of hangers”. Not worth the money for only one.
customer_reviews.author: thia homer

customer_reviews.title: One Kirby ! Picture on ad should be changed !
customer_reviews.text: It was just one key chain. At game stop it was cheaper . I saw this on amazon pictured with 10 and thought it was a great deal... Not!!! I should of read the reviews to good to be true :(
customer_reviews.author: Mo. M.

customer_reviews.title: Its only one
customer_reviews.text: The images make it seem like you are getting the whole series, but it's just a single one. Although my son will be excited, nearly $9 seems too expensive for a single key chain.
customer_reviews.author: B Lueck

customer_reviews.title: Only ONE not several
customer_reviews.text: Only received one when I thought I was getting several as advertised. “HangerS”.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C

customer_reviews.title: Only 1!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a bag fully of Mario figures for this price and thus was mislead by the picture to believe there was a number of Kirby figures. I won't buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich220

customer_reviews.title: Always read the fine text.
customer_reviews.text: Much like other purchasers - I was surprised by the misleading photo. I purchased this expecting a pack of characters - not a single character. Granted, reading the description should be a primary consideration before making a purchase - but I feel line the small font at the end of the disclosure is meant to mislead.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 keychain
customer_reviews.text: Poorly written description and picture. You will only receive 1 keychain, not the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Verofied Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Packing should be better
customer_reviews.text: The kirby with the sword broke but my kid loved it. It needed to be make better.
customer_reviews.author: LAVERNE C. WELLS

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 item
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t clear but you only get one. My son thought he was going to get all 10 when get picked this item but that was a lie and my son was disapointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for the kirby fan
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter as a stocking stuffer, she loves them. Luckily we got two different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jen_Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are cute child like them she’s four years old.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy brown karnowski

customer_reviews.title: Good but durability not so great
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but the kid was able to take off the keychain so it’s just a Kirby
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vinyl Figures for True Fans
customer_reviews.text: These kirby backpack hangers are a really nice gift or a really good addition for your collections, they have great details and great finishes! Great for kirby fans
customer_reviews.author: Vane R Ramos

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: The figure itself is sturdy but the clip is lackluster, has slipped off before. Just be careful and it will work
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Its cute
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a kirby, I got a Metaknight. I take it with a grain of salt tho.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 👍good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise i actually got the secret one! It’s great quality and super cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: keily

product_meta.title: Just Toys LLC Kirby Backpack Hangers - Series 2
product_meta.description: Style:SingleDecorate your backpack with these brand new officially licensed series 2 Kirby backpack hangers with clip. Take to school, in the car or play at home. If you like Kirby, then you can not miss out on these amazing hangers. Collect all 10! 1 random hanger per blind bag.
feature_bullets: Officially licensed series 2 Kirby Backpack Hangers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
